name: Groundhog Dungeon
description:
You are an unfortunate mage trapped within the dungeon of the evil puppeteer. Your only option is to die trying, and your ultimate enemy is... you.
We highly advise dying more than one time :)

Controls
WASD / Arrow keys - move
Left Mouse Button - shoot
